name: Glyph Cracker
description:
Unfortunately this game was overly ambitious and I did not have time to finish!

I am also having trouble getting the Godot export files to run properly.

The basic idea is that alphabet letters fall from the sky and you click on them

to make them explode. I made this game for my 2-year-old son who is learning

to identify letters. This is my first Godot game and now I'm hooked on Godot! I hope to release a working version of this game soon.
